features: DHC Rich Moisture is your go-to facial moisturizer for soft, perfectly hydrated skin. Its long-lasting formula helps plump and revitalize dull, tired-looking skin with a fresh, lightweight texture that absorbs quickly to reveal a soft, glowing finish that lasts all day.
Rich Moisture is a daily moisturizer to alleviate signs of aging, dryness and dehydration, and free radical damage. Lightweight texture aborbs quickly.

Rich Moisture contains naturally antioxidant-rich organic olive oil, sodium hyaluronate, vitamin E, squalane and royal jelly to hydrate and protect from premature aging caused by free radical damage. Health Concern: Skin Dryness
After applying liquid lotion, smooth evenly over face. Great fourth step of the Japanese 4 step regimen.
Fragrance and colorant free. Ideal dry, dehydrated, and sensitive skin.
body.description: DHC's Rich Moisture is your go-to facial moisturizer for soft, perfectly hydrated skin. Its long-lasting formula helps plump and revitalize dull, tired-looking skin with a fresh, lightweight texture that absorbs quickly to reveal a soft, glowing finish that lasts all day.It contains naturally antioxidant-rich organic olive oil, sodium hyaluronate, vitamin E, squalane and royal jelly to hydrate and protect from premature aging caused by free radical damage. Ideal for dry, dehydrated and sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rich Moisture Rich Moisture is your go-to facial moisturizer for soft, perfectly hydrated skin. Its long-lasting formula helps plump and revitalize dull, tired-looking skin with fresh, lightweight texture that absorbs quickly to reveal a soft, glowing finish that lasts all day. It contains naturally antioxidant-rich organic olive oil, sodium hyaluronate, vitamin E, squalane and royal jelly to hydrate and protect from premature aging caused by free radical damage. Ideal for dry, dehydrated and sensitive skin. Key Benefits Japanese formula provides long-lasting, lightweight moisture careBotanical antioxidants protect skin from free radical damageGentle and soothing formula which hydrates and helps calm mild irritationWeightless, fast-absorbing and non-greasyFragrance-free & colorant-free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a daytime moisturizer. It's light and not too heavy. I'm 75 years old and everyone thinks I'm 50.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for dry & sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Years ago I found DHC soap when I received a sample. It was the first facial soap I found that did not dry my skin, cause break outs or make my face look blotchy. I am still using it now. After I started getting at one of the samples I received from DHC was the Rich Moisture cream. It is light, unscented & absorbs quickly,. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and moisturized without being greasy. I use it before putting on my makeup and again after washing my face at night. I have a couple of different night creams that I use and like, however regular use of this leaves me feeling like I don’t need them very often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am using this product for 18 years
reviews.reviewText: I am using this lotion at morning and Extra night time moisturizer from the same company at evening for 18 years . It really works !! This lotion is not greasy , absorbing fast . I am 67 and my skin looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that it is a dispenser bottle. Easy to use. Good light moisturizer for summer. I like DHC products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, more effective than its lightweight would suggest
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product as a liquid moisturizer for several years and continue happily with it. The price is reasonable, it has no smell at all (which I love), and it is effective. The bottle seems to last longer than I would suspect, i.e. I don't know why but a bottle lasts me 6-8 months. It is lightweight , which means it spreads easily under the eyes, but it also seems to moisturize effectively even though it's not sticky and heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer!! It’s the best I have ever used for my oily skin. Please don’t change the ingredients and please continue to make this ♥️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin so this is perfect for day time. Love the texture. I’m a new fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Looking for a lightweight moisturizer to wear daily and under makeup. This has a nice feel and does not leave your skin “sticky” I gave it 5 stars because it did what was advertised and price was reasonable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: It is one of a very few light moisturisers that does not leave the skin feeling greasy. Have used for years.

reviews.reviewTitle: I have been using this moisturizing lotion for 10 years ...
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this moisturizing lotion for 10 years. I plan to stay with it in the future as well.

I have very sensitive, dry skin. After reading the great reviews I hope I would have a similar experience as other users. However, this was not the case. The cream is too light and does not provide for my skin's needs. A bonus though - I did not react to it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 20, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Good but not as good as the cleansing milk
